  • Classes in org.krmdemo.techlabs.core.dump.render used by org.krmdemo.techlabs.core.dump
    Class
    Description
    RenderSpec
    This class represents the rendering details and is used as an optional parameter to all methods in ObjectPrinter interface.

  • Classes in org.krmdemo.techlabs.core.dump.render used by org.krmdemo.techlabs.core.dump.render
    Class
    Description
    Highlight
    This class represents an immutable multidimensional Map of highlight rules, where the value of rule is either Ansi-Style or HTML-Style (mostly the color of text).
    Highlight.Kind
    The kind of JSON or YAML tokens to highlight
    Highlight.Place
    This record represents a key in multidimensional Map to store and lookup the highlight-rules.
    Highlight.Rule
    Individual highlight-rule - the correspondence between place and style to apply.
    Highlight.Structure
    The target logical structure of rendered document (JSON or YAML)
    Highlight.Target
    The target format of output (HTML-document/HTML-fragment, console with ANSI-escape sequences, ...)
    RenderSpec.Feature
